intent_atoms.description: FoundationUI dependency must be declared in Package.swift for ISOInspectorApp
ISOInspectorApp targets must import FoundationUI without compile errors
Integration tests verify module import, component availability (Badge, Card, KeyValueRow), BadgeLevel compatibility, design token accessibility, and platform compatibility
As a developer, I want to add FoundationUI as a dependency so that the app can use its UI components
Use a phased integration approach with Phase 0 for setup and verification, followed by subsequent phases for component, layout, platform, and advanced feature integration
All DS.Spacing tokens must be used instead of hardcoded magic numbers
App launch time <2s, tree scroll ≥55fps, memory usage <250MB
FoundationUI components must coexist with legacy UI during transition
As a developer or QA engineer, I want to document integration patterns and quality gates in Technical Spec
Documentation updates must reflect current phase and quality gates
Create test infrastructure for 80%+ coverage and 0.5d per phase

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Dependency Integration
functional_units.description: Adds FoundationUI as a package dependency to ISOInspectorApp and verifies importability.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStatusBadge Component Usage
functional_units.description: Uses the Badge component from FoundationUI in ParseTreeStatusBadge.swift to display status badges.

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Integration Test Suite
functional_units.description: Provides automated tests confirming module import, component availability (Badge, Card, KeyValueRow), badge levels, design tokens, and platform compatibility.

functional_units.name: Component Showcase SwiftUI View
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI view that demonstrates FoundationUI components for development and testing purposes.

functional_units.name: Technical Specification Documentation of Integration Patterns
functional_units.description: Documents patterns and best practices for integrating FoundationUI into the app.

functional_units.name: Design System Guide Integration Checklist
functional_units.description: Updates the design system guide with a checklist for integrating FoundationUI components.

functional_units.name: SDK Tolerant Parsing Documentation
functional_units.description: Creates DocC article and inline documentation explaining tolerant parsing options in the SDK.
